House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08026
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING SECTIONS 5 AND 8 OF REPUBLIC ACT (RA) NO. 9505, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE PERSONAL EQUITY AND RETIREMENT ACCOUNT (PERA) LAW AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Increases the annual Personal Equity and Retirement Account (PERA) contributions entitled to tax incentives from P100,000 to 200,000 or up to P400,000 for OFWs. Provides that instead of a 5% tax credit, PERA contributions up to the maximum amount shall be allowed as deductions from gross income tax of each contributor.
